item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hey, thanks for stopping by!üëã

I write about machine learning and optimization‚Äîmostly diving into the theory behind them. I try to stick to English, but sometimes I‚Äôll switch it up with Chinese since it‚Äôs my native tongue. Hope you enjoy hanging out here on my blog!

For more details regarding my research, please visit my academic homepage.

Misc.

My Chinese name is ÊÄùÊ∂µ, pronounced Sƒ´ H√°n in Mandarin. (Hear it here via Google Translate)

It was given to me by my mom, and I‚Äôve always loved it.

“ÊÄù” means ‚Äúto think‚Äù or ‚Äúthought,‚Äù and “Ê∂µ” means ‚Äúto forgive,‚Äù ‚Äúto tolerate,‚Äù or ‚Äúto be lenient.‚Äù

My mom once told me she had suffered from anger and intolerance, and she hoped I‚Äôd grow into someone who thinks before speaking, and who approaches others with patience and grace.

I hope I can live up to the name.

Timeline

  • 2020.7.24 : I got my personal domain sihanwei.org on Netlify for $10.99/year (It now costs me $14.99/year since 2021), finally replacing the default *.netlify.app URL.
  • 2020.6.27 : I moved my blog from Github Pages to Netlify. I am way too lazy to build and deploy the website on my own.
  • 2017 - 2018 : I discovered GitHub Pages and Hexo during my senior year while trying to build an academic homepage to boost my grad school applications. I eventually went with Hugo ‚Äî it‚Äôs fast, simple, and, let‚Äôs face it, pretty cool.

item.title: Subscribe
item.description:
Subscribe to This Blog

Stay updated with the latest posts from this blog via RSS!

  • RSS Feed URL: https://blog.sihanwei.org/index.xml
  • How to subscribe:
    Copy the feed URL above and paste it into your favorite RSS reader.

Recommended RSS Readers

  • Feedly ‚Äì Clean, cloud-based, and free
  • Inoreader ‚Äì Power-user friendly with automation
  • Miniflux ‚Äì Minimalist and self-hostable

RSS is a simple, privacy-friendly way to follow blogs ‚Äî no email or accounts required.
You‚Äôll always be the first to know when a new post drops!
